thread.title: Calling Time on Thailand’s Junta

author: The Editorial Board
title: Calling Time on Thailand’s Junta
text:
In politics a seemingly trivial event can trigger a realignment. A case in point is unfolding in Thailand, where the struggle between the royalist elite and the populist movement started by former Prime Minister Thaksin Shinawatra looks set to enter a new phase.
When Deputy Prime Minister Prawit Wongsuwan, a leader of the May 2014 coup, appeared at an outdoor event last month, he shielded his eyes with his hand, revealing a Richard Mille watch. Public speculation ensued over how he could afford such a bauble on a salary of...
